One of the best hentai incest artists and storytellers out there but Hyji is wasted on this mundane stuff.  Where's the taboo intimacy and draw?  I like the shock and tension of the forbidden desires, especially when paired with their illustration quality and style.  This is just bland when compared to the extremes of their previous work and leaves me wanting more.  Anything more really.

Still can’t get my head around why on Earth hyji  waited 3 entries to introduce the NTR. What was the purpose of 3 entire installments of wholesome Noboru & Miki content to just cut it off so abruptly like that. Not that I dislike the direction the story is going, but it just feels like so much time was wasted with 3 whole installments of Noboru x Miki when instead the NTR could’ve been the end of last chapter for example and this one would’ve been an entire chapter for Noboru & his mom. I feel like the story took so long to have any developments that at this point it just feels out of place

Oh! So this is what happened 😏

I’ve genuinely never felt this way about ntr. I’ve never been the type to say wow that just ruined this great series even though I see others do it all the time. But those last few pages hurt my soul bro. Right after the girlfriend play they had in her lingerie too... The way it was bomb dropped so suddenly at the end is so weird to me like if you were going to do that it makes more sense to do it earlier or just leave it for next chapter entirely. It felt so out of left-field! Especially because her reason “he saw us in the toilet” which refers to the jog scene. If you check that scene, Masa wasn’t even there. I still don’t entirely buy that Ms. Miki is being honest but I’ll just assume she is so I can’t be disappointed next chapter. At least Noboru had a positive reaction. He wasn’t upset so I won’t let it bother me too much. Noboru is looking forward to his mom & so am I!! I’m NEVER touching another Hyji work again if Noboru’s mom is off-screen NTR’d too though XD (jk) (unless….?)
